snippet: Rio Tinto has named its copper and coal division head, Jean-Sébastien Jacques, as its chief executive.
abstract: Rio Tinto replaces chief executive Sam Walsh with Jean-Sebastien Jacques, head of its copper and coal division.
lead_paragraph: Rio Tinto has named its copper and coal division head, Jean-Sébastien Jacques, as its chief executive.

headline.print_headline: Rio Tinto Appoints New Chief to Navigate Industry Downturn
headline.main: Rio Tinto Appoints New Chief to Navigate Industry Downturn
